title: 109_s1481
content: Indian Land Probate Reform Technical Corrections Act of 2005 - Amends the Indian Land Consolidation Act to make technical amendments with regard to: (1) partition of highly fractionated Indian land, (2) tribal probate codes, (3) descent and distribution, (4) the fractional interest acquisition program, (5) establishment of fair market value, and (6) land ownership information.
